input_ref: Frontend rebuild (Linode Docker + Vercel prod) — v1.2 audit fix verified 6/6
manual_intervention_reason: Vercel auto-deploy did not trigger on main push; manual vercel --prod required
notes: Second browser audit showed 'Senior Payroll Director' subtitle still visible on demo.payrollsynergyexperts.com. Root cause: demo site DNS points to Vercel (CNAME → vercel-dns), not Linode Docker containers. Discovery: deployment topology is split — demo on Vercel, platform on Cloudflare→Linode, API on Cloudflare→Linode. Fix: (1) Rebuilt Linode frontend containers via pnpm install + pnpm build + Docker rebuild for pse-demo and pse-platform. (2) Triggered manual vercel --prod from PSE--Projects repo root. Vercel built new bundle index-CnmFkDn-.js with all v1.2 changes. Final browser audit: 6/6 PASS — YAML strip, compliance intelligence layer persona, canonical greeting, structured data intake language, no Partner framing, no PIC/Interlink names. All verified on both full CHAP AI page and sidebar widget on demo.payrollsynergyexperts.com.
